About me

I have a passion for transforming business ideas into beautiful web applications. I have built everything in the full-stack curriculum from landing pages with excellent UI to JavaScript and Rails APIs. I have pair-programed with different developers around the world working remotely.

This application was built using HTML5, CSS3, vanilla Javascript, and webpack This application fetches the current weather of a city or at any desired location. Users can toggle between temperature Units

This is a real estate Website. It allows users to find available properties for rent user can sign up, have a dashboard, and sought for properties. Used Node.Js

A phaser 3 platform game. At the start of the game, the player enters his name. The player is then redirected to the game menu, the player can click play or any of the options provided. The player will be taken to the game's main scene if the play button is clicked where there are platforms that are arranged randomly. The player needs to consume all the stars on the platforms by jumping and walking

This is a rails app that allows users to signup and log in. The signed-up user can create an article that is associated with the user's account and is associated with a category. The user can vote for an article and the user can bookmark the article as well. Built with Ruby on Rails 6

An Ecommerce Website that allows users to buy and sell new and used items. The user can list items. HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Glide is the main technology used.
